current_task: Graph physics improvements and native app streaming support
message: Web app improvements: Added graph node pinning via right-click, native app URL schemes for Apple Music/Spotify streaming links, and fixed React lint errors. Ready for production deployment.

features: Right-click context menu for graph nodes (pin in place, hide/show)
Pinned nodes stay locked during physics simulation
Native app URL support (music:// for Apple Music, spotify:// for Spotify)
Settings toggle for 'Open in native app'
Person/Group filter toggles in graph filters
Fixed React lint errors (setState in useEffect anti-pattern)

deployment_ready.warnings_explanation: Intentional cyRef exclusions to prevent Cytoscape reinitialization, img element warnings

verification: Open https://interchord.stonefrog.com and test graph node right-click

next_steps: Verify graph physics with pinned nodes works in production
Test native app links on macOS (requires Apple Music/Spotify installed)
Continue Phase 2 of native Swift app development
